verbs.description: Trump [V: did] not simply overlook the astonishing brutality of North Korea 's regime . He heaped praise on Kim as someone " very open , " " very honorable , " " very smart " ...

[ARG0: Trump] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARGM-ADV: simply] [V: overlook] [ARG1: the astonishing brutality of North Korea 's regime] . He heaped praise on Kim as someone " very open , " " very honorable , " " very smart " ...

Trump did not simply overlook the astonishing brutality of North Korea 's regime . [ARG0: He] [V: heaped] [ARG1: praise] [ARG2: on Kim as someone " very open , " " very honorable , " " very smart "] ...
